content: I would like to attend if someone wouldn't mind sharing the link

example output of @Ashley Mannix's tool that i just mentioned:

libs-team/tools/unstable-api$ cargo run --release -- --feature io_slice_advance --repo-root ~/rust
pub mod std {
    pub mod io {
        impl<'a> IoSliceMut<'a> {
            pub fn advance<'b>(
                bufs: &'b mut [IoSliceMut<'a>],
                n: usize,
            ) -> &'b mut [IoSliceMut<'a>] {
            }
        }

        impl<'a> IoSlice<'a> {
            pub fn advance<'b>(bufs: &'b mut [IoSlice<'a>], n: usize) -> &'b mut [IoSlice<'a>] {}
        }
    }
}
I kind of want to try that on rustdoc now and see how many lines it outputs to do something simple :upside_down:
we can probably modify it a bit to wrap the output in the tracking issue template too
or if someone has a lot of time, --file-tracking-issue-for-pr=123 :D
shouldn't be too hard actually :thinking:
